why-react-native.question: Why choose React Native for mobile development?
why-react-native.answer: React Native enables developing high-performance applications for iOS and Android from a single codebase, reducing costs and development time while maintaining native quality. It also benefits from a large ecosystem and Meta (Facebook) support.

performance.question: How do you ensure application performance?
performance.answer: We optimize every aspect of the application: startup time, memory consumption, smooth animations, data loading... We also use profiling tools to identify and resolve performance issues.

store-publishing.question: Do you handle store publishing?
store-publishing.answer: Yes, we handle the entire publishing process: asset preparation, developer account configuration, submission to stores (App Store and Play Store) and update tracking.

updates.question: How do you manage application updates?
updates.answer: We set up OTA (Over The Air) update systems when possible, and manage updates via stores with an optimized process to minimize validation times.

post-launch-support.question: Do you offer support after launch?
post-launch-support.answer: Yes, we offer various maintenance plans including: performance monitoring, bug fixes, security updates and feature evolution.
